name: *CUSTOM* Portrait of your Cat!
description:
This listing is for a custom portrait of the pet/animal of your choice! All breeds and species are possible and I welcome you to get as creative as you like! More examples of my work, along with recommendations can be found at my Facebook page: 
Portraits By Anna Loewenthal

All paintings are 100% hand rendered by myself on gallery wrapped canvas in acrylic color. Paintings take 3-4 weeks to complete during which time you will be sent "progress shots" to ensure your 100% satisfaction with the work.

I paint from photographic image, or images that can be E-mailed to me at any time along with any specifications for the portrait. If you would like to discuss a CUSTOM size or specific project (multiple pets on a single canvas, extra large sizing, different materials, etc) please E-mail me prior to purchasing this listing and I will create a personalized "option" specifically for your work!

Contact: 
petportraitsbyanna@gmail.com

**NOTE: Due to the nature of customized painting work, you will be given an opportunity to approve the sketch of your animal on canvas (for accuracy, scale, and composition) but once a painting is complete any changes will only be made at my discretion, and may incur additional charge.

name: Rush Order Surcharge
description:
This listing must be purchased in ADDITION to your painting if you have a specific date that you would like your artwork shipped and it falls LESS than 4 weeks from when you order.

It is highly recommended to purchase this item if you are ordering a holiday gift, as these orders will be given first priority over all regular sales which will ensure you get your gift BEFORE the holidays! 

Please E-mail me with the specific date you need your project completed by OR shipped by (generally it will day 1-2 days after completion to package and ship your item so if you are in a serious time-crunch, please specify that the painting needs to SHIP on a specific day.)

name: Freight Shipping for Over Sized paintings
description:
Please select the "size" surcharge that correlates with the painting you purchased. One freight surcharge must be purchased for every over sized item in your cart, even though the reduced "grouped item" shipping rate will apply to every additional large item in your cart.

This listing MUST be purchased in conjunction with the purchase of any painting or project that will measure over 16X20 inches!

If you do not purchase this listing at the time of check out with your painting, I cannot begin work on your painting until you do so which may result in longer lead-times and delayed shipping of your painting.
